languages.text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл осунулся и побледнел. Грациозные движения яростного хищника {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}сменились ломанной птичьей походкой{/d} — аугментика, установленная на сломанную спину, не способна вернуть прежней легкости его ногам. Устало вздохнув, он без всякой радости произносит:{/n} "Вот и вновь мы свиделись, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл осунулся и побледнел. Грациозные движения яростного хищника сменились ломанной птичьей походкой — аугментика, установленная на сломанную спину, не способна вернуть прежней легкости его ногам. Устало вздохнув, он без всякой радости произносит:{/n} "Сегодня я вернул тебе кровавый долг, {name}".

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос Винтерскейл осунулся и побледнел. Грациозные движения яростного хищника {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}сменились ломанной птичьей походкой{/d} — аугментика, установленная на сломанную спину, не способна вернуть прежней легкости его ногам. Устало вздохнув, он без всякой радости произносит:{/n} "Вот и вновь мы свиделись, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of a fierce predator's graceful movements, his is now a lame, birdlike gait. The augmetics in his broken back can't make him as light-footed as he once was. He sighs a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "Today I repaid my blood duty to you, {name}."

{n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of a fierce predator's graceful movements, his is now a lame, birdlike gait. The augmetics in his broken back can't make him as light-footed as he once was. He sighs a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "Today I repaid my blood duty to you, {name}."

{n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now lurches like lame bird. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

{n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now lurches like lame bird. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

{n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

{n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔双颊凹陷，脸色苍白。他走路的步态不再像凶猛的掠食者，而是{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}像跛脚的鸟一样{/d}。他骨折的背部装填了植入物，动作再也无法像之前那么敏捷了。他疲倦地叹了口气，语气中没有一丝喜悦。{/n}“我们又见面了，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔双颊凹陷，脸色苍白。他走路的步态不再像凶猛的掠食者，而是像跛脚的鸟一样。他骨折的背部装填了植入物，动作再也无法像之前那么敏捷了。他疲倦地叹了口气，语气中没有一丝喜悦。{/n}“我们又见面了，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterzunder ist blass, seine Wangen wirken eingefallen. Er bewegt sich nicht länger wie ein gefährlicher Jäger, sondern {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}schwerfällig wie ein lahmer Vogel{/d}. Die Augmentationen in seinem zerstörten Rücken können ihn nicht so leichtfüßig machen, wie er einst war. Er stößt ein erschöpftes Seufzen aus und sagt freudlos:{/n} "So sieht man sich wieder, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterzunder ist blass, seine Wangen wirken eingefallen. Er bewegt sich nicht länger wie ein gefährlicher Jäger, sondern holprig wie ein lahmer Vogel. Die Augmentationen in seinem zerstörten Rücken können ihn nicht so leichtfüßig machen, wie er einst war. Er stößt ein erschöpftes Seufzen aus und sagt freudlos:{/n} "So sieht man sich wieder, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale está más pálido y demacrado. En vez de los movimientos gráciles de un fiero depredador, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}ahora camina encorvado como un ave coja{/d}. Los implantes auméticos que enderezan su espalda rota no le confieren la misma rapidez de antaño. Deja escapar un suspiro de cansancio y se dirige a ti con poco entusiasmo:{/n} «Nos volvemos a encontrar, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale está más pálido y demacrado. En vez de los movimientos gráciles de un fiero depredador, ahora camina encorvado como un ave coja. Los implantes auméticos que enderezan su espalda rota no le confieren la misma rapidez de antaño. Deja escapar un suspiro de cansancio y se dirige a ti con poco entusiasmo:{/n} «Nos volvemos a encontrar, {name}».

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale a les joues creuses et le teint pâle. Ce grand chasseur, qui se mouvait auparavant avec la grâce d'un prédateur féroce, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}avance d'un pas mal assuré, tel un oiseau blessé{/d}. Les augmétiques dans son dos brisé ne suffisent pas à lui redonner son agilité. Il pousse un soupir de lassitude et vous dit sans enthousiasme :{/n} « Comme on se retrouve, {name} ».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale a les joues creuses et le teint pâle. Ce grand chasseur, qui se mouvait auparavant avec la grâce d'un prédateur féroce, avance d'un pas mal assuré, tel un oiseau blessé. Les augmétiques dans son dos brisé ne suffisent pas à lui redonner son agilité. Il pousse un soupir de lassitude et vous dit sans enthousiasme :{/n} « Comme on se retrouve, {name} ».

languages.text: {n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの頬はこけ、顔色は青白くなっていた。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}獰猛な肉食獣{/d}のように優雅に動いて板いた者が、今では足の悪い鳥のようにのたうち回っている。折れた背中のオーグメティックも、彼にかつてのような軽やかな足取りをさせることは出来ない。彼は疲れたため息をつき、つまらなさそうに言う。{/n}「また会ったな、」{name}
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴス・ウィンタースケールの頬はこけ、顔色は青白くなっていた。獰猛な肉食獣のように優雅に動いて板いた者が、今では足の悪い鳥のようにのたうち回っている。折れた背中のオーグメティックも、彼にかつてのような軽やかな足取りをさせることは出来ない。彼は疲れたため息をつき、つまらなさそうに言う。{/n}「また会ったな、」{name}

languages.text: {n}Calligos Winterscale'in yanakları çökmüş ve rengi solmuş. Yaman bir avcının zarif hareketlerini sergilemek yerine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}sakat bir kuş gibi sendeliyor{/d}. Kırık belindeki ogmetikler, eskiden olduğu kadar çevik olmasını engelliyor. Yorgunca nefes veriyor ve neşesiz bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Yeniden karşılaştık {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos Winterscale has grown hollow-cheeked and pale. Instead of the graceful movements of a fierce predator, he now {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}lurches like a lame bird{/d}. The augmetics in his broken back are unable to make him as light-footed as he once was. He lets out a tired sigh and says joylessly,{/n} "We meet again, {name}."

Yaman bir avcının zarif hareketlerini sergilemek yerine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_WinterscaleRedeemed}sakat bir kuş gibi sendeliyor{/d}. Kırık belindeki ogmetikler, eskiden olduğu kadar çevik olmasını engelliyor. Yorgunca nefes veriyor ve neşesiz bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Yeniden karşılaştık {name}."
